alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 10:04PM EDT until August 06 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1003 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Baconton to 10 miles southwest of Newton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Pelham, Camilla, Baconton, Sale City, Flint, Hopeful, Cotton, Laney, Lester, Freeman, Mitchell Co A/P, Branchville, Greenough and Hinsonton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
